body.title: Purpose of the project
body.text: During my 3rd year internship at Neolink I was tasked with automating the import of data from certain streams using Talend Open Studio. This mission allowed me to learn how to use the software and the logic of data integration as well as progress in SQL.

body.title: What is Talend Open Studio?
body.text: Talend Open Studio is a data integration software from multiple sources using
. A job can have multiple input points with different data sources. The data is compared, modified, sorted, and sent to the selected data tables.

body.title: Integration of several streams
body.text:
Talend Open Studio allowed me to create a job to retrieve data from several streams.
I particularly worked on the LHEO stream grouping thousands of training offers with their content, their objectives, and other data.
